start.welcome: Ghost Ghost Stories Bot에 오신 것을 환영합니다! 사용 가능한 명령을 보려면 사용 /도움말.
start.instructions:
🔗 다음 중 하나를 보내주십시오.

*'@'기호로 사용자 이름 :*
`@username`

*'+'기호가있는 전화 번호 :*
`+19875551234`

*이야기와 직접 연결 :*
`https://t.me/username/s/1`
start.freeTrial: ∎ 여기에 새로? 무료로 7 일의 프리미엄 액세스를 받으려면 /freetrial을 사용하십시오!
start.inviteSuffix: 5 개의 가입마다 1 주일 무료, 추천이 지불하는 경우 30 일.
cmd.upgrade: 프리미엄으로 업그레이드 - 추가 날에 더 많은 BTC를 지불하십시오.
cmd.archive: 사용자를위한 보관 된 이야기를 가져 오십시오
msg.invalidInput: 🚫 잘못된 입력. `@username`, `+19875551234` 또는 `https://t.me/username/s/1`을 보내십시오. 자세한 내용은 입력 /도움말.
invalidLink.suspended: 🚫 Too many invalid links. You are suspended for 1 hour.
premium.freeTrialUsed: ❌ You have already used your free trial.
premium.freeTrialActivated: 🎉 Free trial activated! You now have Premium access for 7 days.
premium.info:
🌟 *Premium Access*

Premium users get:
✅ Unlimited story downloads
✅ Monitor up to {{limit}} users' active stories
✅ No cooldowns or waiting in queues

Run `/upgrade` to unlock Premium features.
You will receive a unique payment address. Invoices expire after one hour.
verify.success: ✅ Payment verified! Premium extended by {{days}} days.
profile.cooldown:
⏳ You can request profile media for "{{user}}" once every {{hours}} hours.
Try again in {{h}}h {{m}}m.
monitor.premiumOnly: 🚫 Monitoring profiles is available for premium users.
monitor.limitMsg: You can monitor up to {{max}} profiles.
monitor.limit: 🚫 You can monitor up to {{max}} profiles.
monitor.already: ⚠️ This profile is already being monitored.
monitor.started: ✅ 이제 {{user}}의 활성 스토리와 프로필 사진 변경을 모니터링합니다. {{remaining}}
monitor.none: You are not monitoring any profiles.
admin.confirmRestart: Are you sure you want to restart?
invoice.addressReceived: Address received. Monitoring for payment... Run `/verify <txid>` once paid.
invoice.invalidAddress: ❌ Invalid address. Please send a valid BTC address.
payment.unexpectedAddress: ⚠️ 예상치 못한 주소에서 결제가 감지되었습니다: {{addresses}}. {{from}} 주소에서 결제해 주세요.
payment.partial:
부분 결제가 확인되었습니다. 남은 {{amount}} BTC를 다음 주소로 보내주세요:
`{{address}}`
payment.reminder:
❓ 아직 결제가 확인되지 않았습니다. 이미 전송했다면 /verify <txid> 명령으로 확인해주세요.
트랜잭션 ID(txid)는 지갑의 거래 내역에서 확인할 수 있습니다.
users.none: No users found in the database.
referral.fiveUsers: 🎉 You referred 5 users! Premium extended by 7 days.
referral.paid: 🎉 Your referral made a payment! Premium extended by {{days}} days.
error.unexpected: Sorry, an unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
bug.cooldown: ⏳ You can report another bug in {{h}}h {{m}}m.
stories.invalidLinkFormat: 🚫 Invalid story link format. Expected format: t.me/username/s/id
stories.invalidLinkParse: 🚫 Invalid story link. Could not parse username/channel or story ID.
stories.storyNotFound: 🚫 Story with ID {{id}} not found for "{{user}}"!
stories.errorGeneric: 🚫 Error fetching stories for "{{user}}". User may not exist or have public stories.
stories.userNotFound: 🚫 User "{{user}}" not found. Please check the username.
stories.floodWait: ⚠️ Too many requests. Please wait about {{minutes}} minute(s).
queue.empty: ✅ You have no items in the queue.
queue.already: ⚠️ This download is already in the queue.
queue.rateLimit: 🚫 Too many requests, please slow down.
queue.pendingLimit: 🚫 You already have too many pending requests.
queue.enqueued:
✅ Your request for {{user}} has been queued!
Position: {{position}} | ETA: {{eta}}
queue.processingTimeout: ❌ Your download for {{user}} failed. Reason: Processing timeout
queue.enqueueError: ❌ An error occurred while queuing your request.
download.timedOut: ❌ Download timed out. Please try again later.
pinned.uploading:
📥 {{count}} Pinned stories downloaded successfully!
⏳ Uploading stories to Telegram...
pinned.none: ❌ No Pinned stories could be sent. They might be too large or none were found.
pinned.selectNext: Select the next batch of pinned stories:
pinned.limitReached:
💎 You have reached the free limit of **{{limit}} stories**.

To download all stories from this user and enjoy unlimited access, please upgrade to Premium!

👉 Run the **/premium** command to learn more.
pinned.error: An error occurred while processing pinned stories. The admin has been notified.
active.uploading:
📥 {{count}} Active stories from {{user}} downloaded successfully!
⏳ Uploading stories to Telegram...
active.none: ❌ Cannot download Active stories, most likely they are too large to send via bot.
active.error: An error occurred while sending stories. The admin has been notified.
global.label: global stories
global.uploading:
📥 {{count}} Global stories downloaded successfully!
⏳ Uploading stories to Telegram...
global.none: ❌ No Global stories could be sent. They might be too large or none were found.
global.error: An error occurred while processing global stories. The admin has been notified.
queue.cooldown:
⏳ You can request stories for "{{user}}" once every {{hours}} hours.
Try again in {{h}}h {{m}}m.
download.noStory: ❌ Could not retrieve the requested story.
archive.uploading: 📥 {{count}} Archived stories downloaded successfully!\n⏳ Uploading stories to Telegram...
archive.none: ❌ No Archived stories could be sent.
archive.error: An error occurred while sending archived stories. The admin has been notified.
global.adminOnly: 🚫 이 명령은 관리자만 사용할 수 있습니다.
